SumOfProgramRelatedInvstGrp.Description1Txt: DURING 2022, MARY BLACK FOUNDATION ISSUED A LOAN TO HOMES OF HOPE INC., A 501(C)(3) ORGANIZATION, WHICH ENABLED IT TO BUILD EIGHT SINGLE-FAMILY HOMES IN THE SOUTH SIDE OF SPARTANBURG.
SumOfProgramRelatedInvstGrp.Description2Txt: DURING 2022, THE FOUNDATION ISSUED A LOAN TO THE CHAPMAN CULTURAL CENTER, A 501(C)(3) ORGANIZATION, TO ENABLE IT TO MAKE GRANTS AND COVER OTHER OPERATING EXPENSES UNTIL IT IS ABLE TO RAISE SUFFICIENT CONTRIBUTIONS TO FORWARD-FUND ITS GRANTMAKING.
